name: hot sauce
instructions: 1. Clean and remove the stems from the red chili peppers.
2. In a blender, combine the chili peppers, garlic cloves, white vinegar, salt, lime juice, and honey.
3. Blend on high speed until all the ingredients are well combined and you have a smooth sauce.
4. Taste the hot sauce and adjust seasonings, adding more salt, lime juice, or honey as desired.
5. Transfer the hot sauce to a clean glass jar or bottle.
6. Store in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before using to allow the flavors to meld together.
description: This hot sauce recipe combines the heat of red chili peppers with the tang of lime juice and the sweetness of honey. It is a versatile sauce that can be used to add flavor and spice to a variety of dishes.
